# Copilot Instructions

This is a Next.js 16 project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS for a full-stack software engineer portfolio website.

## Project Overview

- **Type:** Next.js App Router website
- **Purpose:** Professional portfolio for full-stack software engineer
- **Tech Stack:** Next.js 16, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Design:** Premium corporate style, conversion-focused

## Key Features

- Story-led homepage (Challenge → Solution → Process → CTA)
- Services page with detailed offerings
- About page with personal branding
- Contact page with form (needs backend integration)
- Fully responsive design
- SEO-optimized

## Development Commands

- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run lint` - Run linter

## Important Notes

- Contact form needs backend integration (currently simulated)
- Update "YourName" placeholder in Navigation and Footer
- Customize content to match your personal brand
- Add actual contact info and social links

## Code Style

- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Keep components modular and reusable
